name: Mynextpassportstamp
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my next passport stamp
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We introduce world great vacation places but not very popular to the public. 

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open My next passport stamp” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open My next passport stamp"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open My next passport stamp."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open My next passport stamp board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
